item.title: Coding help (still learning)
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:
@xunb3atabl3x wrote:

ok im trying to get npc’s too shout out rules and i can get them in the place and all but they wont shout

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2741) { // Yt-MejKot if (misc.random2(10) == 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "No noclip No black or white pking No 'perfect items'"; }

i searched moo in npc handler and then put that code under it

note that i got this from the tutorial forum.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 10:32:15 PM[/size][hr]and i will be moving them and changing npc when i figure out how to make them shout it out

Read full topic
